properties.body:
WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 17, DNC 18.
F/V GREEN ACRES, FOUR PERSONS ON BOARD,
DISABLED AND ADRIFT IN 41-56.05N 067-26.83W
AT 051529Z JUL. VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RCC BOSTON, PHONE: 617 223 8555,
E-MAIL: RCCBOSTON@USCG.MIL.
